en: “ Anyway , I do n’t want it in exams .
baseline: “ 不管怎样,我不想在考试中考试。

en: “ Ca n’t you just poke it out ? ”
baseline: “ 难道你没把它弄出来 吗? ”

en: “ And it was n’t pleasant I can tell you . ”
baseline: “ 我能告诉你,这并不愉快。 ”

en: When you catch a fairy , you get three wishes .
baseline: 当你抓到一个仙女时,你得到三个愿望。

en: In a flash the fairy was out of my nose and gone .
baseline: 就在一瞬间,仙女从我鼻子里消失了。

en: Steven wanted to be a dentist .
When , a couple of weeks later we were invited over to his house we saw that this was not an idle remark .
baseline: 几周后,我们被邀请到他的家里,我们发现这不是闲事。
